name: Square Mobile Backend Server
description: An example mobile backend server for Square In-App Payments

sq0atp-RP1Wo5gjDyH4ujKywtW3WA.description: Your "Access Token" or "Personal Access Token" which can be found on your Square Application Dashboard [https://connect.squareup.com/apps/]. You can process payments by POSTing to the /chargeForCookie path with your payment nonce as the value on the nonce key for a JSON body
